name: DJ Panzer
description:
Germans, Danes, Tanks and techno music - is there any better combination? Hit the dance floor and your enemy. DJ Panzer is a 1 vs. 1 competitive tank shooter using vinyls as a game controller. By turning the vinyls the players can control the direction of the tanks. Synchronized to the beat the tanks shoot automatically forward.

https://youtu.be/TZIUR3O5zAw
